issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h4. Issue
----

On iOS 5.0+ only, the sound produced by Ti.Media.AudioPlayer (with default settings) only comes out of the right channel of a headset. The behavior (stereo sound) is correct on the 4.3.5 simulator, so this may be an Apple bug or behavior change between major versions.

h4. Testing
----

You're going to want a pair of headphones for this one.

Kitchen Sink -> Phone -> Sound -> Remote Streaming -> "Start Streaming"

*PASS:* Sound comes from both channels
*FAIL:* Sound from right (or left) channel only
fields.summary: iOS: Ti.Media.AudioPlayer audio only in right channel

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
